about.content: Development experience with the HTML/CSS/Javascript stack, using the Bootstrap library. Development in React/NextJS/Typescript. I strive to write understandable and maintainable code, use the BEM methodology, follow SOLID/DRY and observe uniformity in class names. I combine adaptive and flexible layout, use Flex and Grid technologies, and work with audio and video files.
